content: **midnight dream shawl wrap scarf** looking for an easy yet sophisticated pattern for your next project well you re in the right place this crochet shawl wrap scarf is elegant and sophisticated wear this midnight dream as a wrap shawl or an oversized scarf the versatility of *style* and *function* the perfect combination add dimension and a little fantasy to your wardrobe the midnight dream shawl wrap scarf can be made based on your measurements additional gauge information and instructions on how to substitute different yarn is all available in the written pattern on my website
